Subject: Session Timeout
Description: Hallo Support, We have set the following values for the session timeout Session timeout (min): 15 Timeout counter (sec): 60 As far as I could tell from the online documentation, the session timeout is valid for inactivity. https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.3/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/SystemConfiguration/Overview.htm However, I get the session timeout message every 14 minutes. Even if I make a change within 14 minutes. Can you please tell me whether this is a bug or whether the session timeout is set regardless of activity/inactivity. Regards Anatoli Lorenz
